summary: Operator workload scheduling issue requires action
description: Your cluster's ${OPERATOR_WORKLOAD} cannot be scheduled due to ${REASON}. To resolve this issue, please ensure your cluster has adequate worker node capacity to support the desired number of replicas. For more information on scaling worker nodes, refer to the documentation: https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/openshift_container_platform/4.19/html/machine_management/manually-scaling-machineset.
